sn22.111:4.2: “Mendicants, you should give up any desire, greed, relishing, and craving for form.
sn22.111:4.3: Thus that form will be given up, cut off at the root, made like a palm stump, exterminated, and unable to arise in the future.
sn22.111:4.4: You should give up any desire, greed, relishing, and craving for feeling …
sn22.111:4.8: Thus that consciousness will be given up, cut off at the root, made like a palm stump, exterminated, and unable to arise in the future.”
